title: Windows 11 build 22000.493 is rolling out with more fixes
content:
It’s yet again time for Microsoft’s Patch Tuesday, when all supported versions of Windows get security and reliability updates. This month, Windows 11 is getting updated to build 22000.493, and if you were hoping this would be the day we get Android app support, that doesn’t seem to be the case. As with most other

The post Windows 11 build 22000.493 is rolling out with more fixes appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has released this month's Patch Tuesday updates, but Windows 11 build 22000.493 doesn't include Android apps or new features.
